turn.4: They have evolved from the single skin metal cladding often associated with agricultural buildings to multi-layer systems for industrial and leisure application.

turn.12: Above all else the wide acceptance has resulted from the simple constructive training, fast assembly, and the low costs of the trapezoidal profile construction.
